description: Creamy and filling, this spiced sweet potato soup recipe is nutritionally approved and loaded with lentils. Whip it up for a warming midweek dinner.
keywords: Healthier Spiced Sweet Potato & Lentil Soup
name: Healthier Spiced Sweet Potato & Lentil Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using a stick blender, blend soup until smooth. Season with pepper. Stir in three-quarters of the lentils. Ladle soup among bowls. Top with a dollop of yoghurt, remaining lentils and coriander leaves. Season with pepper and serve.

Using a stick blender, blend soup until smooth. Season with pepper. Stir in three-quarters of the lentils. Ladle soup among bowls. Top with a dollop of yoghurt, remaining lentils and coriander leaves. Season with pepper and serve.
